Detailed Description

This class implements the Classifier class using the KNN paradigm. A KNN classifier only needs as input parameters the number of neighbours and a dataset.

See also:
Classifier, Dataset, FeatureVector, Text
Author:
Eliezer Tal√≥n (elitalon@gmail.com)
Date:
2009-04-29

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

KnnClassifier::KnnClassifier ( const unsigned int &  nNeighbours,
Dataset *const   dataset 
) [explicit]

Parameters:
nNeighbours Number of neighbours to search for every sample.
dataset Dataset to use in classification and training methods.
Warning:
The dataset is only used by the class. A KnnClassifier object is not responsible of deallocating the dataset.

Member Function Documentation

std::vector< std::string > KnnClassifier::performClassification ( const std::vector< FeatureVector > &  featureVectors  )  [virtual]

Parameters:
featureVectors An array of feature vectors to classify.
Returns:
An array of std::string objects with the characters found, one character per vector in the array passed.

Implements Classifier.

void KnnClassifier::performTraining ( const std::vector< FeatureVector > &  featureVectors,
const std::vector< std::string > &  characters,
const Text &  referenceText 
) [virtual]

Parameters:
featureVectors An array of feature vectors that matches the array of characters previously classified.
characters An array of std::string objects with classified characters for training.
referenceText A text to compare with the classificatios results to control the training decision.
Precondition:
The size of all input parameters must be equal.

Implements Classifier.
